name: places/ChIJ8-HkDQtZwokRPoOyMA7pEjo
adrFormatAddress: 365 1st Ave., New York, NY 10010-6503, USA

originalText.text: I don’t usually write reviews but as someone who has recently moved to the city from abroad I’m appalled at the level of service from this ‘company’. They don’t answer your queries and then rent the place without giving you any information but still taking the non- refundable application fee. Judging from other reviews it looks like I avoided a terrible company but I’m still annoyed by their actions. AVOID!

text.text: I don’t usually write reviews but as someone who has recently moved to the city from abroad I’m appalled at the level of service from this ‘company’. They don’t answer your queries and then rent the place without giving you any information but still taking the non- refundable application fee. Judging from other reviews it looks like I avoided a terrible company but I’m still annoyed by their actions. AVOID!

originalText.text: Horrible management. My phone calls were rarely returned and when they were I was yelled at on the phone saying it was "not their job" to call me back. The new tenant that was supposed to move in almost didn’t because the woman (won’t name names) was so rude and unhelpful. If you have another managment company option to go with, go with the other option.

originalText.text: Absolute trash landlords. They’ll get you in an illegal rent situation, double your rent, and be rude and condescending to you as they do it.

text.text: Absolute trash landlords. They’ll get you in an illegal rent situation, double your rent, and be rude and condescending to you as they do it.

originalText.text: The worst management company out there. Steer clear of these frauds. They're so unprofessional and employ intimidation tactics to get tenants to leave on their terms and not legal ones.
